Stools</a></li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"menu-item primary view-all\"><a href=\"http://www.furniturelandsouth.com/shop-furniture/childrens?shop\">View All</a></li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</ul>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</li>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"menu-item\"><a class=\"pg-home\">\n\n\t\t<section class=\"hero-slider-container\">\n\t\t\t<div class=\"bx-wrapper\" style=\"max-width: 100%;\"><div class=\"bx-viewport\" aria-live=\"polite\" style=\"width: 100%; overflow: hidden; position: relative; height: 654px;\"><ul class=\"hero-slider-list\" style=\"width: auto; position: relative;\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"hero-slider-list-item \" Lexington</h2>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h1 class=\"h3\">Bold new design ideas for every room in your house.</h1>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/shop-furniture/search?manufacturer=4947\" class=\"btn btn-gold\">Shop class=\"bx-viewport\" aria-live=\"polite\" style=\"width: 100%; overflow: hidden; position: relative;\"><div class=\"bx-loading\"></div><ul class=\"product-list\" style=\"width: 8215%; position: relative;\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"product-list-item no-breakout \" style=\"float: left; list-style: none; position: relative; width: 255px; margin-right: 20px;\" data-product-sku=\"LEXIN13154\" data-product-name=\"Shadow Valley Media Console\" itemscope=\"\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Product\">\n\t\t<div class=\"product-data-primary\">\n\t\t\t<a href=\"http://www.furniturelandsouth.com/shop-furniture/lexington-home-brands-shadow-valley-media-console-714-907\" class=\"product-link\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"product-img-shape\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<div alt=\"Image of Shadow Valley Media Console\">\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"product-wishlist-badge\"><svg><use xmlns:xlink=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink\" xlink:href=\"#icon-heart\"></use></svg></div>\n\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t<h2 class=\"unformatted\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"product-brand\" itemprop=\"brand\">Lexington Home Brands</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"product-name\" itemprop=\"name\">Shadow Valley Media Console</span>\n\t\t\t\t</h2>\n\t\t\t\t<meta itemprop=\"category\" content=\"Media {\n\t\tvar w = window;\n\t\tw.google_conversion_id = 978870088;\n\t\tw.google_conversion_label = \"1N0pCJOozWAQyL7h0gM\";\n\t\tw.google_remarketing_only = false;\n\t}\n\t// DO NOT CHANGE THE CODE
